Interface playn.core.util.Clock

Changed Methods
float alpha() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns the current paint call's {@code alpha}.
float dt() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns the ms between the current alpha-adjusted paint time (aka .time) and the last alpha-adjusted paint time.
float time() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns the current time, adjusted for the latest paint's alpha.
